input.ssml: <speak><break time='2000ms'/>Go!<break time='1000ms'/>Printing is a fragile thing, and there are hundreds of reasons why it may fail. In case if printing won't work properly in GanttProject, we usually recommend exporting a chart as an image or PDF and then printing the output, using third-party tools. The challenging moment for many people is how to tile a big chart to print every tile on ordinary <say-as interpret-as='characters'>A4</say-as> paper.</speak>
